sense.def:
To love someone
pomeni čutiti ljubezen ali spolno privlačnost do nekoga in je za tistega človeka ta oseba zelo pomembna.

seg.quote: I do not think I love him enough to marry him.
‘I love you, Colin.’—‘I love you too, Janet.’

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
loves someone
, mu je tista oseba zelo pri srcu.

seg.quote: They make us feel safe and secure, loved and wanted.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
loves something
, ima nekaj zelo rad in čuti, da je pomembno.

seg.quote: They don't love their village in the way that their parents did.

sense.def:
Love
je zelo močno čustvo pripadnosti ali ljubezni do nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: Her love for him never wavered.
You are not marrying for love.
...a man with a genuine love of literature.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
would love to do something
, si zelo želi nekaj storiti.

seg.quote: I would love a photograph of Edith Evans.
Posy said she'd love to stay.

sense.def:
Izraz
love
ali
love from
, ki mu sledi naše ime, lahko uporabimo na koncu neuradnega pisma.

seg.quote: Hope you are all well at home. Love, Dan.

sense.def:
Pri tenisu izid
love
pomeni rezultat nič.

Kadar je nekdo
in love with someone
, čuti ljubezen ali spolno privlačnost do nekoga in ve, da je ta oseba zanj zelo pomembna.

seg.quote: They are in love with each other and wish to marry.

sense.def:
To fall in love with someone
pomeni začeti nekoga ljubiti.

seg.quote: I fell madly in love with Ellen the first time I saw her.

sense.def:
Kadar dve osebi
make love
, imata spolni odnos.

To have a love-hate relationship with someone or something
pomeni čutiti močna čustva tako ljubezni kot sovraštva.

cit.quote: odnos, v katerem se prepletata ljubezen in sovraštvo
